scripts.upload: ng build --configuration production & aws s3 --profile myevride rm s3://xumm.community/ --recursive & aws s3 --profile myevride cp ./dist/xumm-community s3://xumm.community/ --recursive --include '*' --acl public-read --cache-control public,max-age=31536000,no-transform
scripts.upload-dev: ng build --configuration production & aws s3 --profile myevride rm s3://dev.xumm.community/ --recursive & aws s3 --profile myevride cp ./dist/xumm-community s3://dev.xumm.community/ --recursive --include '*' --acl public-read --cache-control public,max-age=31536000,no-transform
scripts.upload-qa: ng build --configuration production & aws s3 --profile myevride rm s3://qa.xumm.community/ --recursive & aws s3 --profile myevride cp ./dist/xumm-community s3://qa.xumm.community/ --recursive --include '*' --acl public-read --cache-control public,max-age=31536000,no-transform
scripts.upload-fixissuertrustline: ng build --configuration production & aws s3 --profile myevride rm s3://fixissuertrustline.xumm.community/ --recursive & aws s3 --profile myevride cp ./dist/xumm-community s3://fixissuertrustline.xumm.community/ --recursive --include '*' --acl public-read --cache-control public,max-age=31536000,no-transform
